wikipedia_page.main: Connor Rhys Brown (born 28 April 1997) is a Welsh cricketer. He made his first-class debut on 28 March 2017 for Cardiff MCCU against Glamorgan as part of the Marylebone Cricket Club University fixtures. He made his List A debut for Glamorgan in the 2018 Royal London One-Day Cup on 30 May 2018. Brown was released by Glamorgan ahead of the 2021 County Championship.
